title: Jim Carrey eloquently expresses his grief in one heartbreaking tweet
text:
Jim Carrey eloquently expresses his grief in one heartbreaking tweet Jim Carrey eloquently expresses his grief in one heartbreaking tweet Share 
We can‚Äôt imagine what Jim Carrey is going through right now. 
Carrey today attended the funeral of his ex-girlfriend Cathriona White, helping to carry the coffin as hundreds of family and friends gathered to mourn her death in the village of Cappawhite, Co Tipperary in Ireland. 
Afterwards, he posted this moving tweet, which absolutely broke our hearts. Love cannot be lost. üåπ pic.twitter.com/XxPYOhkdzc 
‚Äî Jim Carrey (@JimCarrey) October 10, 2015 
Carrey dated the 30-year-old in 2012 and was pictured holding hands with her this year. He described her death in Los Angeles as like being ‚Äúhit with a lightning bolt‚Äù. Share article 
The Mask actor was among six men who acted as pallbearers as they left the small church and led the mourners on the 500m walk to the cemetery on a hill on the edge of the village. Promoted Stories
